{{Wired embedded system |brand=Banana Pi |model=BPI M5 |revision=(4GB) |asin=B08QSD48N2 |newegg=9SIB1A6JGV4171 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SinoVoIP |est_release_date=09/2020 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=USB Female Type-C |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S905X3 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLMAG1JETD-B041 |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_model=PS082-062 BT |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Super Speed USB 3.1 Gen1 Hub Controller;VIA Labs;VL817;;1;,,, 4Mbit Serial Multi I/O Flash;Puya Semiconductor;P25Q40H;;1;,,, 5V 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280AAC;;1;,,, 2A 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089A;;1;,,, Ultra low dropout 500mA CMOS LDO;Will Semiconductor;WL2803E;;4;,,, 18V 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy Corp;SY8120B1;;4;,,, 300mA CMOS Linear Regulator;First Silicon;FC8731;;2;,,, Microprocessor Supervisory Circuit;SGMicro;SGM803;;1;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance TVS Array;SemTech;RClamp0544T;;6; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.1, IR receiver, Audio out (3.5mm), UART, I2C, SPI, PWM, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2015.01;00049-gfe343ff-dirty; |stock_os=Linux;4.9.241;Debian 11; |tp_firmware=Arch Linux (Arm), Armbian (unofficial), CoreELEC, Ubuntu Core, Manjaro ARM, Volumio, Android 9 |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=bananapi }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - Banana Pi BPI-M5}} :[https://www.banana-pi.org/en/banana-pi-sbcs/55.html Product page]
*[https://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-M5 ''Banana Pi BPI-M5'' on '''BPi''' Wiki]
*[https://www.hackster.io/news/the-banana-pi-bpi-m5-features-4gb-ram-and-an-optional-wi-fi-usb-dongle-c693c5fc210c ''The Banana Pi BPI-M5 Features 4GB RAM'' on '''Hackster.io'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/09/14/banana-pi-bpi-m5-amlogic-s905x3-sbc/ ''Banana Pi BPI-M5 Amlogic S905X3 SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/fifth-gen-banana-pi-goes-amlogic/ ''Fifth-Gen Banana-Pi Goes Amlogic'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S905X3 @2.0GHz :SoC: Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A55) *GPU: Mali-G31 @650MHz (OpenGL 2.0/ES 3.2) :VPU (with 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *Storage: 16GB eMMC 5.1 Flash, :TF card (max.256GB)/MMC Card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) RAM *USB: 4x USB 3.0 ports *Network: 1x 1GbE port *GPIO: 1x 40-pin connector *Power Source: 5V/3A via USB Type-C
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/Banana Pi models}}
